text: The Brothers is a British TV show. It is about a person who drives things to different places. When he dies, his family has to deal with their sadness and his road hauling business. It ran from 10 March 1972 to 19 December 1976 for 7 seasons and 92 episodes. It was created by Gerard Glaister. It was originally played by Glyn Owen and then by Patrick O'Connell. ==Other websites== * * TV Cream entry Category:1972 television series debuts Category:1976 television series endings Category:1970s British drama television series Category:1972 establishments in the United Kingdom Category:BBC Television programmes
title: The Brothers (1972 TV series)
